theory.brief: Ôn tập: (1) Present Perfect - dùng 'for' với khoảng thời gian, 'since' với mốc thời gian, 'already/just' trong khẳng định, 'yet' trong phủ định/câu hỏi. (2) So sánh hơn: short adj + -er / more + long adj. So sánh nhất: the + short adj + -est / the most + long adj. (3) 'too' = quá (tiêu cực), 'enough' = đủ.
examples: I have lived here for 5 years / since 2019.
She has already finished. / He hasn't arrived yet.
This book is more interesting than that one.
This is the tallest building in the city.
The coffee is too hot to drink. / He is old enough to drive.

exercises.question: I have lived in this city __________ 2015.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'since' với mốc thời gian cụ thể (2015)

exercises.question: She has worked here __________ ten years.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'for' với khoảng thời gian (ten years)
hints: ten years là khoảng thời gian → for

exercises.question: Have you finished your homework __________?
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'yet' trong câu hỏi

exercises.question: I have __________ eaten lunch, so I'm not hungry.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'already' trong câu khẳng định khi việc đã hoàn thành

exercises.question: This car is __________ than that one.
exercises.explanation: 'expensive' là tính từ dài, dùng 'more + adj'

exercises.question: Mount Everest is __________ mountain in the world.
exercises.explanation: So sánh nhất: the + adj-est

exercises.question: The soup is __________ hot to eat.
exercises.explanation: 'too' + adj chỉ mức độ quá khiến không thể làm gì

exercises.question: He is tall __________ to reach the shelf.
exercises.explanation: 'adj + enough' = đủ... để làm gì

exercises.question: Have you __________ been to Paris?
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'ever' trong câu hỏi về kinh nghiệm

exercises.question: I have __________ seen that movie. It's amazing!
exercises.explanation: 'just' = vừa mới (hành động xảy ra rất gần hiện tại)

exercises.question: This exercise is __________ than the last one.
exercises.explanation: 'difficult' là tính từ dài → more difficult
hints: So sánh hơn với tính từ dài

exercises.question: She is the __________ student in our class.
exercises.explanation: 'smart' là tính từ ngắn → the smartest
hints: So sánh nhất với tính từ ngắn

exercises.question: I haven't seen him __________ last Monday.
exercises.explanation: 'last Monday' là mốc thời gian → since
hints: Mốc thời gian cụ thể → since

exercises.question: They have known each other __________ many years.
exercises.explanation: 'many years' là khoảng thời gian → for

exercises.question: This book isn't interesting __________.
exercises.explanation: 'adj + enough' = đủ...
hints: Không đủ hấp dẫn → not... enough

exercises.question: The room is __________ small for all of us.
exercises.explanation: 'too' + adj = quá... (tiêu cực)
hints: Quá nhỏ cho tất cả → too

exercises.question: I have __________ tried sushi before. It's my first time.
exercises.explanation: 'never' = chưa bao giờ (phủ định)
hints: Lần đầu tiên = chưa từng → never

exercises.question: Tom is __________ than his brother.
exercises.explanation: 'tall' là tính từ ngắn → taller

exercises.question: This is __________ movie I have ever seen.
exercises.explanation: So sánh nhất bất quy tắc: good → the best

exercises.question: Have they arrived __________?
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'yet' ở cuối câu hỏi

exercises.question: She has lived in London __________ 2010.
acceptedAnswers: since

exercises.question: They have been friends __________ a long time.
acceptedAnswers: for
hints: 'a long time' là khoảng thời gian

exercises.question: My sister is __________ (old) than me.
acceptedAnswers: older

exercises.question: This is the __________ (beautiful) garden in our town.
acceptedAnswers: most beautiful
hints: So sánh nhất với tính từ dài: most + adj

exercises.question: The water is __________ cold to swim.
acceptedAnswers: too

exercises.question: She is smart __________ to solve this problem.
acceptedAnswers: enough

exercises.question: Have you __________ visited Japan?
acceptedAnswers: ever

exercises.question: I have __________ finished my homework.
acceptedAnswers: already
hints: Câu khẳng định, đã hoàn thành → already

exercises.question: This exercise is __________ (easy) than the previous one.
acceptedAnswers: easier
hints: easy → easier (đổi y thành i, thêm -er)

exercises.question: He is the __________ (bad) player on the team.
acceptedAnswers: worst

exercises.wrongSentence: I have lived here since five years.
exercises.correctSentence: I have lived here for five years.
exercises.explanation: 'five years' là khoảng thời gian, dùng 'for'

exercises.wrongSentence: She is more tall than her sister.
exercises.correctSentence: She is taller than her sister.
exercises.explanation: 'tall' là tính từ ngắn, dùng adj + -er

exercises.wrongSentence: This is the most easy question.
exercises.correctSentence: This is the easiest question.
exercises.explanation: 'easy' là tính từ ngắn, dùng the + adj-est

exercises.wrongSentence: Have you finished your work already?
exercises.correctSentence: Have you finished your work yet?
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'yet' trong câu hỏi

exercises.wrongSentence: The bag is too heavy enough to carry.
exercises.correctSentence: The bag is too heavy to carry.
exercises.explanation: Không dùng 'too' và 'enough' cùng nhau

exercises.wrongSentence: I haven't seen him for last week.
exercises.correctSentence: I haven't seen him since last week.
exercises.explanation: 'last week' là mốc thời gian, dùng 'since'

exercises.wrongSentence: This is the goodest cake I've ever had.
exercises.correctSentence: This is the best cake I've ever had.
exercises.explanation: good → better → the best (bất quy tắc)
hints: good là tính từ bất quy tắc

exercises.wrongSentence: I have just not finished my homework.
exercises.correctSentence: I have not finished my homework yet.
exercises.explanation: Phủ định dùng 'not... yet'

exercises.wrongSentence: He is enough old to drive.
exercises.correctSentence: He is old enough to drive.
exercises.explanation: 'enough' đứng sau tính từ

exercises.wrongSentence: She has never been to Japan ever.
exercises.correctSentence: She has never been to Japan.
exercises.explanation: Không dùng 'never' và 'ever' cùng nhau

exercises.question: The weather today is __________ than yesterday.
exercises.explanation: good → better (so sánh hơn bất quy tắc)

exercises.question: She has __________ been to Australia. She really wants to go.
exercises.explanation: 'never' = chưa bao giờ (chưa có kinh nghiệm)

exercises.question: This box is __________ heavy for me to lift.
exercises.explanation: 'too' + adj = quá... không thể làm gì

exercises.question: We have lived in this house __________ we got married.
exercises.explanation: 'since' + mệnh đề/sự kiện

exercises.question: This is the __________ restaurant in town.
exercises.explanation: So sánh nhất với tính từ dài: the most + adj

exercises.question: I haven't finished reading this book __________.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'yet' trong câu phủ định

exercises.question: My English is not good __________ to understand him.
exercises.explanation: 'adj + enough' = đủ...
hints: Không đủ tốt → not good enough

exercises.question: She has worked at this company __________ January.
exercises.explanation: 'January' là mốc thời gian → since

exercises.question: The elephant is __________ than the lion.
exercises.explanation: 'big' là tính từ ngắn, gấp đôi phụ âm cuối

exercises.question: Have you __________ tried Vietnamese food?
exercises.explanation: Hỏi về kinh nghiệm → ever
hints: Câu hỏi về kinh nghiệm → ever

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: I / have / lived / here / since / 2018
exercises.correctSentence: I have lived here since 2018
acceptedAnswers: I have lived here since 2018
I have lived here since 2018.
hints: have + past participle + since + mốc thời gian

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: This / is / the / tallest / building / in / the / city
exercises.correctSentence: This is the tallest building in the city
acceptedAnswers: This is the tallest building in the city
This is the tallest building in the city.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: The / coffee / is / too / hot / to / drink
exercises.correctSentence: The coffee is too hot to drink
acceptedAnswers: The coffee is too hot to drink
The coffee is too hot to drink.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: Have / you / ever / been / to / Paris?
exercises.correctSentence: Have you ever been to Paris
acceptedAnswers: Have you ever been to Paris
Have you ever been to Paris?

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: She / is / more / intelligent / than / her / brother
exercises.correctSentence: She is more intelligent than her brother
acceptedAnswers: She is more intelligent than her brother
She is more intelligent than her brother.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: He / is / old / enough / to / vote
exercises.correctSentence: He is old enough to vote
acceptedAnswers: He is old enough to vote
He is old enough to vote.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: They / have / already / finished / their / homework
exercises.correctSentence: They have already finished their homework
acceptedAnswers: They have already finished their homework
They have already finished their homework.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: This / is / the / most / expensive / car / I / have / ever / seen
exercises.correctSentence: This is the most expensive car I have ever seen
acceptedAnswers: This is the most expensive car I have ever seen
This is the most expensive car I have ever seen.
hints: the most + adj + noun + I have ever + past participle

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: The / room / is / too / small / for / all / of / us
exercises.correctSentence: The room is too small for all of us
acceptedAnswers: The room is too small for all of us
The room is too small for all of us.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: I / haven't / seen / her / since / last / month
exercises.correctSentence: I haven't seen her since last month
acceptedAnswers: I haven't seen her since last month
I haven't seen her since last month.
hints: haven't + past participle + since + mốc thời gian

exercises.question: This test is __________ than the one we did last week.
exercises.explanation: 'easy' là tính từ ngắn, đổi y → i, thêm -er

exercises.question: I have known her __________ I was a child.
exercises.explanation: 'since' + mệnh đề (I was a child)

exercises.question: She hasn't called me __________.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'yet' trong câu phủ định

exercises.question: This dress is __________ expensive for me to buy.
exercises.explanation: 'too' + adj = quá... không thể làm gì

exercises.question: My brother is the __________ person in our family.
exercises.explanation: 'funny' là tính từ ngắn → funniest

exercises.question: Have you __________ finished reading that book?
exercises.explanation: 'already' có thể dùng trong câu hỏi để thể hiện sự ngạc nhiên
hints: Hỏi với sự ngạc nhiên → already

exercises.question: The movie was not interesting __________.
exercises.explanation: 'not + adj + enough' = không đủ...
hints: Không đủ hấp dẫn → not... enough

exercises.question: He has worked here __________ three months.
exercises.explanation: 'three months' là khoảng thời gian → for

exercises.question: Summer is __________ than winter in Vietnam.
exercises.explanation: 'hot' là tính từ ngắn, gấp đôi phụ âm cuối

exercises.question: This is the __________ day of my life!
exercises.explanation: 'happy' → happiest (so sánh nhất)

exercises.question: I have waited here __________ two hours.
acceptedAnswers: for

exercises.question: She hasn't eaten anything __________ yesterday.
acceptedAnswers: since

exercises.question: This movie is __________ (boring) than the last one.
acceptedAnswers: more boring
hints: So sánh hơn với tính từ dài

exercises.question: He is the __________ (young) child in his family.
acceptedAnswers: youngest

exercises.question: This bag is __________ heavy for me to carry.
acceptedAnswers: too

exercises.question: She is not tall __________ to ride this roller coaster.
acceptedAnswers: enough

exercises.question: I have __________ arrived home. The traffic was terrible!
acceptedAnswers: just

exercises.question: Has the bus left __________?
acceptedAnswers: yet

exercises.question: This problem is __________ (difficult) than I thought.
acceptedAnswers: more difficult
hints: So sánh hơn với tính từ dài

exercises.question: She is the __________ (good) singer in our school.
acceptedAnswers: best

exercises.question: The train is __________ than the bus.
exercises.explanation: 'fast' là tính từ ngắn → faster

exercises.question: She has __________ finished cleaning her room.
exercises.explanation: 'already' trong câu khẳng định khi việc đã hoàn thành

exercises.question: The pizza is not warm __________.
exercises.explanation: 'not + adj + enough' = không đủ...
hints: Không đủ ấm → not warm enough

exercises.question: I have studied English __________ I was five years old.
exercises.explanation: 'since' + mệnh đề
hints: since + I was five years old

exercises.question: This is the __________ problem we have ever faced.
exercises.explanation: 'big' → biggest (so sánh nhất)

exercises.question: I have __________ met him before. Nice to meet you!
exercises.explanation: 'never' = chưa bao giờ gặp
hints: Lần đầu gặp → never met before

exercises.question: This exercise is __________ difficult for children.
exercises.explanation: 'too' + adj = quá... cho ai

exercises.question: They have been married __________ a long time.
exercises.explanation: 'a long time' là khoảng thời gian → for

exercises.question: My city is __________ polluted than it was 10 years ago.
exercises.explanation: So sánh hơn: more + adj

exercises.question: This is the __________ interesting book I've ever read.
exercises.explanation: So sánh nhất: the most + adj dài

exercises.vietnamese: Tôi đã sống ở đây từ năm 2020.
acceptedAnswers: I have lived here since 2020.
I have lived here since 2020
I've lived here since 2020.
I've lived here since 2020
hints: have lived + since + mốc thời gian

exercises.vietnamese: Đây là cuốn sách hay nhất tôi từng đọc.
exercises.answer: This is the best book I have ever read.
acceptedAnswers: This is the best book I have ever read.
This is the best book I have ever read
This is the best book I've ever read.
This is the best book I've ever read
hints: the best + noun + I have ever + past participle

exercises.vietnamese: Cà phê này quá nóng để uống.
exercises.answer: This coffee is too hot to drink.
acceptedAnswers: This coffee is too hot to drink.
This coffee is too hot to drink
The coffee is too hot to drink.
The coffee is too hot to drink

exercises.vietnamese: Cô ấy cao hơn anh trai cô ấy.
exercises.answer: She is taller than her brother.
acceptedAnswers: She is taller than her brother.
She is taller than her brother
She's taller than her brother.
She's taller than her brother

exercises.vietnamese: Bạn đã bao giờ đến Nhật Bản chưa?
exercises.answer: Have you ever been to Japan?
acceptedAnswers: Have you ever been to Japan?
Have you ever been to Japan

exercises.vietnamese: Tôi chưa hoàn thành bài tập về nhà.
exercises.answer: I haven't finished my homework yet.
acceptedAnswers: I haven't finished my homework yet.
I haven't finished my homework yet
I have not finished my homework yet.
I have not finished my homework yet

exercises.vietnamese: Anh ấy đủ cao để chơi bóng rổ.
exercises.answer: He is tall enough to play basketball.
acceptedAnswers: He is tall enough to play basketball.
He is tall enough to play basketball
He's tall enough to play basketball.
He's tall enough to play basketball

exercises.vietnamese: Cô ấy vừa mới về đến nhà.
acceptedAnswers: She has just arrived home.
She has just arrived home
She's just arrived home.
She's just arrived home
She has just got home.
She has just got home

exercises.vietnamese: Đây là tòa nhà cao nhất trong thành phố.
exercises.answer: This is the tallest building in the city.
acceptedAnswers: This is the tallest building in the city.
This is the tallest building in the city
This is the highest building in the city.
This is the highest building in the city

exercises.vietnamese: Tôi đã biết cô ấy được mười năm rồi.
exercises.answer: I have known her for ten years.
acceptedAnswers: I have known her for ten years.
I have known her for ten years
I've known her for ten years.
I've known her for ten years
I have known her for 10 years.
I have known her for 10 years
hints: have + past participle + for + khoảng thời gian
